overview: Thee Nodes, a band from Montreal, were on the verge of making their big break onto the mainstream music scene. Upon returning from a tour to Australia, the band experience a tremendous breakdown and is plagued with personal tragedy. Filmmaker James Watts examines the personal dynamics of the rockers, giving the audience a glimpse of the trials and tribulations of a band on the road to success.
tagline: Coming To A City Near You!!!
title: Who Are You Mr. Node?
